Employees are paid at least a living wage
To reach a sustainable future, every company must pay all employees enough to meet their basic needs and secure essential services for themselves and their families.

A living wage includes the minimum expenses to address basic needs, such as nutritious food, potable water, transportation, decent housing and healthcare. These costs will vary on a region-by-region basis.
